item.title: World steel production
item.description: Time series data: Steel production world (millions metric tons) Source for data: World Steel Association tail(dsts,10) ## Time Series: ## Start = 2012 ## End = 2021 ## Frequency = 1 ## year production ## 2012 2012 1560 ## 2013 2013 1650 ## 2014 2014 1671 ## 2015 2015 1622 ## 2016 2016 1629 ## 2017 2017 1732 ## 2018 2018 1817 ## 2019 2019 1767 ## 2020 2020 1654 ## 2021 2021 1717
